commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule create
commands.syntax:
az dynatrace monitor tag-rule create --monitor-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--log-rules]
                                     [--metric-rules]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule create -g rg --monitor-name monitor -n default --log-rules "{send-aad-logs:enabled,send-subscription-logs:enabled,send-activity-logs:enabled,filtering-tags:[{name:env,value:prod,action:include},{name:env,value:dev,action:exclude}]}" --metric-rules "{sending-metrics:enabled,filtering-tags:[{name:env,value:prod,action:include}]}"

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule delete
commands.syntax:
az dynatrace monitor tag-rule delete [--ids]
                                     [--monitor-name]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--yes]
examples: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule delete -g rg --monitor-name monitor -n default -y

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule list
commands.summary: List all tag rule by monitor name.
examples: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule list -g rg --monitor-name monitor

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule show
examples: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule show -g rg --monitor-name monitor -n default

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule update
commands.syntax:
az dynatrace monitor tag-rule update [--add]
                                     [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--log-rules]
                                     [--metric-rules]
                                     [--monitor-name]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--remove]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--set]
                                     [--subscription]
examples: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule delete -g rg --monitor-name monitor -n default -y

commands.name: az dynatrace monitor tag-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
